#include "global.h"

Functions

void pwm_setup_all (void)
 Sets up all the timers on the chip for PWM fast output with prescalers of 64. Useless on BOB as he only uses timer1 for PWM and timer0 and timer2 for interrupts.
void pwm_setup0 (void)
 Sets up timer0 for fast PWM with prescaler 64.
void pwm0A (uint8_t value)
 Sets the PWM duty cycle to the value passed to it in the value variable for OCR0A.
void pwm0B (uint8_t value)
 Sets the PWM duty cycle to the value passed to it in the value variable for OCR0B.
void pwm_setup1 (void)
 Sets up timer1 (16Bit PWM/Timer) for fast PWM with prescaler 64.
void pwm1A (uint16_t value)
 Sets the PWM duty cycle to the value passed to it in the value variable for OCR1A.
void pwm1B (uint16_t value)
 Sets the PWM duty cycle to the value passed to it in the value variable for OCR1B.
void pwm_setup2 (void)
 Sets up timer2 for fast PWM with prescaler 64.

 Sets the PWM duty cycle to the value passed to it in the value variable for OCR2A.

 Sets the PWM duty cycle to the value passed to it in the value variable for OCR2B.

void pwm_setup_all ( void   ) 

Sets up all the timers on the chip for PWM fast output with prescalers of 64. Useless on BOB as he only uses timer1 for PWM and timer0 and timer2 for interrupts.
